response.original_title: North Richond: Past, Present and Future
response.overview: Engaging documentary chronicles the history of Contra Costa County's unincorporated community of North Richmond, California. The film features a cast of community residents, civic leaders and politicians who provide reflections of the past, and prospects of the areas future from both social and economic perspectives.  The film is part 4 of the award winning An Exploration of Our History documentary series, produced by North Richmond teens through the Digital Technology Academy media arts program.
response.title: North Richond: Past, Present and Future
